modName: Cleric Armours of the Nine Devines - Credo StandAloneMod
summary: Unique armours for Warrior Clerics of the Nine Divines - 4 so far.. with a Crusader of the Nine also added..
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/ClericArmoursTitle.png[/img]

Warrior Cleric Armour is a StandAlone release of the  [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/798555-credo-wip/]Credo - WIP[/url]

This mod adds  unique armours to the game, the armours are the equivalent of Steel stat wise, and craft-able with the steel smith perk, you can also temper the armours like any other and the ingredients again are the same as crafting standard steel armour. This armour has been created by my self using a variety of components from the Witcher 2 armours legally ported over to Skyrim, by the wonderful L0rd0fWar, AlphaWolf and my self.

[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/ClericArmoursv15Small.png[/img]

VERSION 1.5 INFO: IMPORTANT PRE-INSTALLATION INFO

Pre-Installation:

You MUST have Skyrim patched to the latest 1.8 update for this mod to work.

[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/Installation.png[/img]

Copy the data folder into your game directory.. Yes to merge folders..

With steam this will be:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\


[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/Credits.png[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/938388]83Willow[/url] for her wonderful screens, please check out her image section.

Dejawolf for the original Helm, mesh and texture: Zenithar Helm

Rathos for the original Helm, mesh and texture: Arkay & Crusader Helm\'s

L0rd0fWar, AlphaWolf and my self for porting Witcher 2 assets

Nightasy for his essential tutorial videos - [url=http://nightasy.com/index.php]Nightasy Website[/url]

CD Project RED for the Witcher 2

Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK

All CK work, skinnig/rigging, customisation of components used and re-texture work done by my self


[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/Permissions.png[/img]


Assets assembled into the new model by my self are free to use with out requesting permission, with the following exeptions:

1- Any assets I have been granted permission to use in the creation of this mod, will need to have permission requested from you
if you wish to use them.

2- Credit must be given to Dejawolf from the TaleWorlds forums for his creation of the Helm mesh and texture.

3 Credit must be given to Rathos also of the Taleworlds forums, for the original mesh & texture\'s of the Arkay and Crusader helm\'s.

I would also just hope to be credited if you use any parts of any of my mods.

[img]http://i1083.photobucket.com/albums/j398/ActusReus/Mod%20Titles/OtherMods.png[/img]
[color=\"#FFA500\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26321]Northman Armours[/url][/color]
[color=\"#FFA500\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26313]Plate Armours[/url][/color]

Thank you and I hope you enjoy.[/center]
author: ActusReus
